title: South Ribble in Lancashire is the best place to live in UK
text: South Ribble in Lancashire is the BEST place in the UK for people in their twenties to live thanks to its Â£157,000 average house price and thriving jobs market Channel 4's the Best Place to Live in the UK revealed the winner Also in the top five were Warrington, Blaby, Copeland and Cheshire London is the worst place to move as it's the least affordable Cumbria is the only local authority in England where you can still buy a house for less than three times the average local salary Published: 21:26 GMT, 21 February 2017 | Updated: 21:32 GMT, 21 February 2017 37 shares
